participants.name: Mary Elizabeth Brown, CIR
participants.title: Talent Acquisition at Capital One (Recruiting Software Engineers - Java, Big Data)

messages.message:
Full Stack Developer Manager - Capital One

Hi Brian, 

I came across your profile today when looking for candidates who could be the perfect fit for my Full Stack and Front End Developer Manager openings. Our positions are based in Mclean, VA and your background definitely stood out to me. We offer competitive pay, work life balance, relocation assistance and fantastic benefits. We were also ranked #17 on Forbes 100 best companies to work for in 2017! 

Please know that at this time we cannot offer sponsorship for future employment. I am a lead recruiter for Capital One and would love a chance to work with you!!!

Thanks,
Mary

Mary Elizabeth Brown, CIR
mary.brown@capitalone.com
Thank you for connecting! Sorry, I don't want to work for a stuffy financial institution.
